name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MYFlixer For PC,windows and Mac (100% Safe Download)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to fetch poster,relased,boxoffice,genre & IDMb ratings for movies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our "Myflixer for PC, Windows, and Mac" offers easy, simple access to Netflix movie details. Enter any movie name to uncover ratings, directors, actors, language, and plot effortlessly. Enjoy a streamlined experience with this user-friendly extension.

✅This is my extension features:

1) Enter Netflix Movie: If you provide the name of any movie on Netflix here, you will discover its details.

2) Movie Details: Type the name of the Netflix movie in the box above, and upon searching, you will uncover all the details of the movie, encompassing its rating, director, actors, language, and plot.

3) Easy To use

4) Simple Extension

✅ How To Use Myflixer on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You will see:

"Enter Netflix Movie"

"Movie Details"

Step 4: Enter the name of any Netflix movie here to uncover its details. Simply type the movie's name in the search box above, and you'll reveal all its information, including rating, director, actors, language, and plot.

Step 5: Enjoy a safer browsing experience!

✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "Myflixer for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the Myflixer Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the Myflixer Android app.
